author: Victoria Hernandez
title: Trey Songz Shares "Anticipation III" Mixtape
text:
0 
Trey Songz is teasing fans who are awaiting his new album with his Anticipation III mixtape. 
The 11-track project features fellow Virginia artist MIKExANGEL and is produced by Nizzy and Farsi, Mogul and $K. Dave East appears on “93 Unleaded.” 
Trigga Trey promised his Tremaine album this year, his first LP since 2015’s Trigga Reloaded . At the end of 2016, he explained the delay between projects to 106 KMEL. 
“Nowadays music is so like fast food, in content in general — not just music,” he said. “Everybody takes everything in so fast and then they’re on to the next thing, so I want to figure out how to hold people’s attention.” 
The R&B singer also released the Trappy New Years mixtape with Fabolous to celebrate the holiday, but lately has made a lot of headlines for things other than music, including lashing out at a D.C. hotel and trashing the stage at a performance in Detroit. 
Trey Songz’ Anticipation III mixtape stream is above and check out the cover art and tracklist below. A3 f. MIKExANGEL (produced by Nizzy x Farsi x Deats) Mind Fuckin f. MIKExANGEL x Chisanity x Justine Darcenne (produced by @realskmusic) 93 Unleaded f. Dave East (produced by Rex Kudo) If It Ain’t Love f.
